clinical_study.brief_title: interACTION: A Portable Joint Function Monitoring and Training System for Remote Rehabilitation Following TKA
clinical_study.official_title: interACTION: A Portable Joint Function Monitoring and Training System for Remote Rehabilitation Following Total Knee Arthroplasty

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to determine if home-based therapy with monitoring via telemedicine can overcome many barriers to compliance and improve rehabilitation. Patients undergoing total knee arthroplasty will be followed for 10 weeks during their outpatient physical therapy course. Subjects will undergo standard physical therapy or physical therapy paired with InterACTION for 10 weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Value evaluated by the ratio of patient outcomes to costs of rehabilitation
primary_outcome.description: Value will be evaluated by the ratio of patient outcomes to costs of rehabilitation

secondary_outcome.description: Subjects enrolled in the InterACTION group will be measured by reports generated from the InterACTION device. Subjects in the Standard Physical Therapy Group will complete exercise logs that will be monitored at each study visit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Satisfaction with InterACTION Device or Standard Physical Therapy Program
secondary_outcome.description: Subjects will undergo an interview to give a description of their experience with their prescribed rehabilitation program. If they were enrolled in the interACTION group they will be asked their opinion and feedback about they device.

Subject will be measured by an average composite score of performance based measures(6-minute walk test, stair climb test, timed up and go test, unilateral balance test), when compared to normative reference standardized scores.
Extension of both knees will be measured with a goniometer and the side-to-side difference will be expressed in degrees.
Flexion of both knees will be measured with a goniometer and the side-to-side difference will be expressed in degrees.

arm_group.description: After total knee arthroplasty, subjects will undergo physical therapy 1 time per week supplemented by home exercise program with InterACTION device.
After total knee arthroplasty, subjects will undergo standard of care physical therapy 2 times per week with standard home exercise program.

intervention.description: InterACTION guided home exercise program paired with standard of care physical therapy
